Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: A diverse group of people has been vocal in a series of posts about some critical issues facing Australia today. Political leaders and advocates are calling for an increase in the JobSeeker payment to help those in need amid the pandemic. Meanwhile the share market takes a hit amidst US economic fears. On the upside the Australian government has announced a multi-billion dollar investment in the country's tourism industry set to create jobs and boost the economy. Finally Sydney will host the 2023 Quad Leaders Meeting an important opportunity for Australia on the international stage.
